EVNOTIFY_MAIL_TEXT: The desired charging status has just been reached. Thank you for using EVNotify.
TELEGRAM_START_TEXT: Hi! I am the EVNotify Bot and I will notify you about your charging status, if you like. Just enter /subscribe to begin! If you need any help, you can enter /help at any time.
TELEGRAM_HELP_TEXT: I can notify you about the charging status of your Electric Vehicle. To do this, just enter /subscribe. If you don't want any additional messages, simply enter /unsubscribe.
TELEGRAM_TOKEN_ENTER: I will be able to notify you soon. However first I need your tiken. You can find this in the app under Settings. Do not ever share this with third parties!
TELEGRAM_SUBSCRIBTION_SUCCESSFULL: Great! As of now I can send you notifications. Set the desired value in the app and I will notify you as soon as this value is reached.
TELEGRAM_SUBSCRIBTION_FAILED: Huh? Somehow there is not much I can do with this token - are you sure it is correct? Please try with a renewal of /subscribe.
TELEGRAM_UNSUBSCRIBTION_SUCCESSFULL: I won't notify you again. In case you change your mind, you can change your Notifier
TELEGRAM_UNSUBSCRIBTION_FAILED: Interesting, something went wrong with the delivery
TELEGRAM_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE: Hi! I just wanted to notify you quickly of the fact that your EV has reached the disired.
